Package in.co.rays.proj4.util

Class EmailUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.co.rays.proj4.util.EmailUtility
  • public class EmailUtility
extends java.lang.Object

    Utility class used to send email messages using JavaMail API. It reads SMTP configurations from the system.properties file and sends email in TEXT or HTML format using the EmailMessage class.

    This class supports:

    • SMTP authentication
    • SSL/TLS configuration
    • Sending email to one or multiple recipients
    • Sending HTML or Plain Text messages

    Configuration is loaded from:
    in.co.rays.proj4.bundle.system.properties

    Expected properties: 

     smtp.server = smtp.gmail.com
 smtp.port   = 465
 email.login = your-email@gmail.com
 email.pwd   = your-password
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:

      • sendMail

        public static void sendMail​(EmailMessage emailMessageDTO)
                     throws ApplicationException
        Sends an email using the values provided in the EmailMessage object.
        Parameters:
        emailMessageDTO - object containing email details such as To, Subject, Message, and Message Type
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - if any SMTP or configuration error occurs
